description: A fund to track financial transactions

allocationFrom.description: All the funds that this fund is allowed to receive money from. This would be 1 fund or none. If this field is blank their is no restriction on allocating to this fund

items.description: UUID of the fund this fund is allowed to receive money from

allocationTo.description: All the funds that this fund is allowed to send money to. This could be one or many.

items.description: UUID of the fund this fund is allowed to send money to

code.description: A unique code associated with the fund

externalAccountNo.description: Corresponding account in the financial system. Will be recorded in payment generated as well.

fundStatus.description: The current status of this fund

ledgerId.description: UUID of the financial ledger associated with this fund

tags.description: The list of tags associated with this fund

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
